title: Calories in Aperol Spritz
meta_description: Learn calories in Aperol spritz with a full nutrition breakdown, including carbs, sugars, and tweaks for variations in this popular cocktail.
assumptions: Standard recipe: 75ml Aperol, 90ml prosecco, 30ml soda water, orange slice; served chilled, no added garnishes or sugar.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, pour sizes, recipe tweaks, and glassware; alcohol content affects totals. Consult labels or apps for precision.

quick_answer.text: One standard Aperol Spritz contains about 175 calories, primarily from sugars in the Aperol and prosecco.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp simple syrup for extra sweetness

faqs.q: How many calories in one Aperol Spritz?
faqs.a: Approximately 175 calories for a standard serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Aperol Spritz?
faqs.a: About 15g total carbs, mostly sugars at 14g per cocktail.

faqs.q: Is Aperol Spritz low in fat or protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 0g fat and 0g protein; it's primarily carbs from the liqueurs.

faqs.q: How does pour size affect calories in Aperol Spritz?
faqs.a: Larger pours of Aperol or prosecco can add 50+ calories; stick to standard ratios.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie tweaks for Aperol Spritz?
faqs.a: Yes, use less Aperol or drier prosecco to drop it to 135-155 calories.
